remarks: Move proper substitution in and out of a membership relation. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2005.)  Obsolete as of 18-Aug-2018.  Use ~ sbcel2 instead.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
sbcel2gOLD $p |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. B e. C <-> B e. [_ A / x ]_ C ) ) $.
$d B x $.
